properties.text: Geography could affects the policy and resources of a country.
The bigger the size of your country, the harder it is to implement a policy. Country's size could affect the implementation and effect delay of a policy.

Land and water dictates the resources of your country. More water area could mean your country will have a large fisheries industries. More land on the other hand, could mean your country will have large agriculture industries instead.

Land and water dictates the resources of your country. More water area could mean your country will have a large fisheries industries. More land on the other hand, could mean your country will have large agriculture industries instead.
Choose initial crisis for your country. Try to get out of that crisis without causing even more crisis.
